name: Kujyaku
effect: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Navy} type card other than [Kujyaku] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Activate: Main] You may trash this Character: Up to 1 of your Characters gains +1000 power during this turn.
